mapper.insert: insert into lian_withdraw_log (user_id, order_no, order_date, amount, bank_card, lian_bank_code, bank_name, order_info, create_time, sync_ret_code, sync_ret_msg, asyn_ret_time, asyn_ret_code, lian_pay_no, settle_date, status, province_code, city_code, brabank_name, verify_status, notify_url ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{syncRetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncRetMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asynRetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{asynRetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lianPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brabankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update lian_withdraw_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lian_bank_code = #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_info = #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync_ret_code = #{syncRetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sync_ret_msg = #{syncRetMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asyn_ret_time = #{asynRetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, asyn_ret_code = #{asynRetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lian_pay_no = #{lianPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_date = #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brabank_name = #{brabankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lian_withdraw_log_id = #{lianWithdrawLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select lian_withdraw_log_id, user_id, order_no, order_date, amount, bank_card, lian_bank_code, bank_name, order_info, create_time, sync_ret_code, sync_ret_msg, asyn_ret_time, asyn_ret_code, lian_pay_no, settle_date, status, province_code, city_code, brabank_name, verify_status, notify_url from lian_withdraw_log where lian_withdraw_log_id = #{lianWithdrawLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
